attributes.action: TO GIVE JOHN PATRICK GRANT THE MEDICAL TREATMENT HE DESERVES & MORE THAN ENTITLED TO TO LET HIM LIVE -GIVE HIM SOME SORT OF QUALITY OF LIFE &SO HE CAN SEE HIS KIDS &GRANDKIDS B4 HE DIES!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
JOHN P GRANT 54&DYIN.

EVERYDAY MY M8VAL FAXPM TIL UMFIN REAL DONE! ,EVEN CALL FROM PM 2ME-NO-1STILL/HASN’T DONE ANYTHIN 2SAVE MY LIFE!.SHE’S WROTE THIS ONMY BEHALF(MY SELF-APPOINTED ADVOCATE)IM 2DEPRESED/ILL/TIRED 2FIGHT ANYMOR SHE’S A WRITER. ONLY WANT 2C MYKIDS & G-KIDS B4 IDIE &ISN’T LONG@THIS RATE!.DESPITE HER MESAGE” MANCHESTR "SUCESFUL" KEYHOLE SURGERY 2MEND FAULTY BYPAS”.

5YRS AGO I PAID £140K MY OWN MONEY-FLORIDA 4TRIPLE BYPAS 2COMEBAC HOMELES-SPENT 71NITES ON STREETS-WAKIN2 DOGS PEEIN ONME!.

AS FIREMAN&PARAMEDIC-I SAVED MANY PPLES LIVES &STILL I’VE POST TRAUMATIC STRESS,TRAUMA I FACED EACH DAY STILL GET NITEMARES BTWN BROKEN SLEP/ CHEST &EVEN BACPAIN DU2 AVOIDBLE FAL@WORK 3YRS AGO.I’VE NEVER NOT WORKED& LONG 2WORK AGAIN.IM NOW HOUSEBOUND IN FINCHLEY(N LONDON.

SHE TELLS EVERY1 HOW MANY PPL I SAVED, ANGER IN URVOICE–NO-1  ATEMPTS2HELP!

SHE KNOWSWOT2DO,IMPRTANT!NEEDS KEYS(RITE PPL 2HELP SAVE ME!)VAL(LANC)TRAVEL NOPROB.

CONTAC UR ASAP IF U/NO SUM1 2ELP/FASTRAC UR2RITE PATH!.TEL UR M8S-ESP.IF IN PRESS ETC.PLZ SIGN,PASSON.W/ SITE-GETIN SORTD,SHE’LL POST ADDY WIV PM LETTER. 

STHELENSLASS123@YAHOO.CO.UK MOB 07828221491

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
